snippet: BNP Paribas pinned its hopes on a legal memo. | Regulators may restrict BNP’s dollar-clearing operations. | The notion of legal education is colliding with the profit motive in Charleston, S.C. | Goldman’s new chief strategy officer will continue...
abstract: BNP Paribas pinned its hopes on a legal memo. | Regulators may restrict BNP’s dollar-clearing operations. | The notion of legal education is colliding with the profit motive in Charleston, S.C. | Goldman’s new chief strategy officer will continue to expand the bank’s businesses.

headline.main: Morning Agenda: BNP's Secret Weapon Misfired
